exec forge run --artifact ./dir1+test
cmp stdout golden.txt

-- golden.txt --
earthly
--artifact
./dir1+test/*
Image ./dir1+test output as test
Artifact ./dir1+test output as test

{"artifacts":{"./dir1+test":"test"},"images":{"./dir1+test":"test"}}
-- earthly_stdout.txt --
Image ./dir1+test output as test
Artifact ./dir1+test output as test
-- dir1/Earthfile --
VERSION 0.8

foo:
    RUN echo "foobar"
